channel.title: [RS2HD] HELP rep++
channel.description:
Changed the ip in client.java
I have ported correctly Fire wall is set No-ip is set I always run server before i run client My path/classpath is working fine as well my jdk is updated and yea i did fix jdk inside of *run* on both clients and compiler
I even had a 317 running and that client connected just fine, but when i tried using a 562 the client would not connect to my ip, i even had to try turning off windows fire wall completly. this did not work i have no idea why i cant get this to work, i will rep++ if you can help me i do have team viewer and msn pm me for details

item.title: [RS2HD] HELP rep++
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“prison190, post:1, topic:399241”]And yea i did change the ip in all 3 places in the clients and compiler works fine.

I have ported correctly
Fire wall is set
No-ip is set
I always run server before i run client
My path/classpath is working fine as well
my jdk is updated
and yea i did fix jdk inside of run on both clients and compiler

I even had a 317 running and that client connected just fine, but when i tried using a 562 the client would not connect to my ip, i even had to try turning off windows fire wall completly. this did not work i have no idea why i cant get this to work, i will rep++ if you can help me i do have team viewer and msn pm me for details[/quote]

The server has to be running before the client.

Read full topic
